block.p: BERNSTEIN-Lenore (Geist). On Friday, July 14th, 2000. Mother of Susan Bernstein of Queens, NY, and Dr. Marc Bernstein of New Orleans, LA. Sister of the late Alan Geist. Grandmother of Ellen and Marla Bernstein. Graveside services are on Wednesday, July 19th, 11 AM, at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery, 7800 Myrtle Ave., Glendale, New York. In lieu of flowers memorials to charities of choice preferred. For information call Bultman Funeral Home of New Orleans, 504-895-7766.
